definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Can you drive through a ring of fire?
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過一個火環嗎？

sentences.english: The name "Ring of Fire" refers to areas below the earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 名字中的“火環”是指區域下方的地球表面。

sentences.english: The ring of fire is seen in Hongdao, Qingdao, eastern China's Shandong province
sentences.chinese: 在中國山東省東部青島市紅島看到的火環。

sentences.english: The Pacific Ocean is surrounded by a belt of active volcanoes called the Circle of Fire.
sentences.chinese: 太平洋周圍是一個活火山帶，叫“火環”。
